markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Mutant Giant Toad](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1951)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Mutant giant toads prefer to dwell in polluted refuse heaps, contaminated swaths of sand, or other poisonous wastes. Often afflicted with a vestigial face or limbs, its back is studded with acid-filled pustules.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Mutant Giant Toad](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1951)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Mutant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=229" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 84</row>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 44

**Resistances**
acid 5

**Poisonous Warts** Any creature that hits the giant toad with an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) Strike or otherwise touches the toad is exposed to giant toad poison.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12,
**Damage** 1d8+7 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tongue +12 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** tongue grab

**Giant Toad Poison**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 20 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (1 round); **Stage 2** stupefied 1 and [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) (1 round)

**Squirt Acid** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The mutant giant toad squirts a 60-foot line of acid from the pustules on its back. Creatures in the area take 3d6 acid damage (DC 20 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The mutant giant toad can't Squirt Acid for 1d4 rounds.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Medium, 1d8+3 bludgeoning, Rupture 8

**Tongue Grab**   A creature hit by the giant toad's tongue becomes [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) by the giant toad. The creature isn't [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24), but it can't move beyond the reach of the toad's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with a successful Strike against AC 15 that deals at least 6 slashing damage. This deals no damage to the toad but prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-315" />
name: Mutant Giant Toad

Often afflicted with a vestigial face or limbs, its back is studded with acid-filled pustules. Creatures in the area take 3d6 acid damage (DC 20 basic Reflex save). The mutant giant toad can't Squirt Acid for 1d4 rounds. The creature isn't immobilized, but it can't move beyond the reach of the toad's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue with a successful Strike against AC 15 that deals at least 6 slashing damage. This deals no damage to the toad but prevents it from using its tongue Strike until it regrows its tongue, which takes a week.
